statements: UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, receiver_address = '123 Main St' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transactions SET sender_address = '456 Elm St', timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 1002;

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.75 WHERE sender_address = '123abc' AND receiver_address = '456def';
